title: Kagurabachi
description:
The story follows Chihiro Rokuhira, the son of a renowned blacksmith capable of forging unique swords. Chihiro dreams of one day becoming a great swordsmith himself, but his life is turned upside down when a gang of sorcerers attack his home and assassinate his father.

Chihiro vows revenge, and takes up his fatherâ€™s seventh and final blade, the Kagurabachi. The Kagurabachi is a powerful sword that is infused with magic, but it also comes with a curse. Anyone who uses the Kagurabachi will eventually be consumed by its power.

Chihiro sets out on a journey to find the sorcerers who killed his father and exact his revenge. Along the way, he meets a variety of interesting characters, including a mysterious swordsman named Haru, a young girl named Sakura who is also seeking revenge, and a group of mercenaries who are willing to help Chihiro for the right price.
author: Takeru Hokazono
